org.apache.mahout.classifier.email
Class PrepEmailVectorsDriver

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      org.apache.mahout.common.AbstractJob
          org.apache.mahout.classifier.email.PrepEmailVectorsDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
public class PrepEmailVectorsDriver
extends AbstractJob

Convert the labels generated by SequenceFilesFromMailArchives and SparseVectorsFromSequenceFiles to ones consumable by the classifiers. We do this here b/c if it is done in the creation of sparse vectors, the Reducer collapses all the vectors.
